prompt: How do you shutdown Windows? Execute: shutdown
How do you reboot Windows? Execute: shutdown -r
How do you lock Windows? Execute: Rundll32.exe user32.dll,LockWorkStation
How do you copy files? Execute: explorer.exe
How do your partition a disk? Execute: diskmgmt.msc
How do you open calculator? Execute: calc.exe.
How you you add new local users, run task scheduler, or view events? Execute: compmgmt.msc
